#Text= Katara says : " Well , actually what I 'm trying to say is , some of us might fetch water , while someone else might set up the fire pit , or put up the tent .

column1: #Text=I do n't need a fire , I 've already collected my own food and look , my tent 's all set up .
#Text=" Katara says : " Well , that 's great for you , but we still need to finish - " Toph says : " I do n't understand what 's the problem here !
